scripts.clean: rm -rf target/ output/ node_modules/ bower_components/ && yarn install
scripts.build: yarn install && yarn run build:pages && yarn run build:scss && yarn run build:langbundle
scripts.build:pages: yarn run build:legacy && yarn run build:search && yarn run build:settings && yarn run build:uploadlist
scripts.build:legacy: cross-env-shell "pulp build -O -m LegacyPage | browserify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify - | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > ${npm_package_config_buildjs}/index.js"
scripts.build:search: cross-env-shell "pulp build -O -m SearchPage | browserify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify - | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > ${npm_package_config_buildjs}/searching.js"
scripts.build:settings: cross-env-shell "pulp build -O -m SettingsPage | browserify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify - | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > ${npm_package_config_buildjs}/settings.js"
scripts.build:langbundle: cross-env-shell "pulp build -O --to output/genlang.js -m Tools.GenLangStrings && node output/genlang.js > ${npm_package_config_buildlang}/jsbundle.json"
scripts.dev:langbundle: cross-env-shell "pulp build -O --to output/genlang.js -m Tools.GenLangStrings && node output/genlang.js > ${npm_package_config_devlang}/jsbundle.json"
scripts.build:uploadlist: cross-env-shell "pulp browserify --optimise -m Uploads.UploadList --standalone PS | browserify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify - | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > ${npm_package_config_buildjs}/uploadlist.js"
